title: From Holocaust to Innovation
description: A biography of Holocaust survivor who lost all his family. How he recovered and became a productive industrialist.Story starts at childhood at small town in Poland. The horrible world-war II events terminated at Auschwitz concentration camp. The escape from the camp two weeks before the end of the war. Building a new life in Israel as a new immigrant. Establishing a factory with innovative products while raising his children.
author: David Klayman
